name: Class SimpleTreeVisitorES6<R,​P>
text:
A simple implementation of the TreeVisitor for ECMAScript edition 6.

 The visit methods corresponding to ES 6 language constructs walk the
 "components" of the given tree by calling accept method passing the
 current visitor and the additional parameter.

 For constructs introduced in later versions, visitUnknown
 is called instead which throws UnknownTreeException.

  Methods in this class may be overridden subject to their
 general contract.  Note that annotating methods in concrete
 subclasses with @Override will help
 ensure that methods are overridden as intended.
codes:
@Deprecated(since="11",
            forRemoval=true)
public class SimpleTreeVisitorES6<R, P>
extends SimpleTreeVisitorES5_1<R, P>

methods.method_sig:
public R visitModule (ModuleTree node,
                     P p)

public R visitExportEntry (ExportEntryTree node,
                          P p)

public R visitImportEntry (ImportEntryTree node,
                          P p)

public R visitClassDeclaration (ClassDeclarationTree node,
                               P p)

public R visitClassExpression (ClassExpressionTree node,
                              P p)

public R visitForOfLoop (ForOfLoopTree node,
                        P p)

public R visitYield (YieldTree node,
                    P p)

public R visitSpread (SpreadTree node,
                     P p)

public R visitTemplateLiteral (TemplateLiteralTree node,
                              P p)
